[![](https://i2.wp.com/static.flickr.com/26/65861309_566367fc9b.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/65861309/ "photo sharing") [Theobold’s Road](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/65861309/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
I grabbed this shot with my phone yesterday afternoon, trying to capture the beautiful light playing on the buildings. And, well, the camera wasn’t up to it. Still work to be done there, I think.
